name: US Aviation Training Solutions INC
about: US Aviation Training Solutions (USATS) is a renowned flight school with a rich history dating back to 1987, originally founded as Helicopter Adventures Inc. in Concord, CA. Now based in Titusville, FL, USATS has evolved to become a leading provider of both helicopter and airplane flight training. The school boasts a global reputation, having trained thousands of aviators from over 120 countries. USATS offers comprehensive programs, including the Professional Pilot Program, Private Pilot License, Instrument Rating, Commercial Pilot License, and Certified Flight Instructor certifications. With state-of-the-art facilities and an FAA Part 145 Repair Station, USATS ensures top-notch education and maintenance. Their commitment to excellence has empowered countless individuals to pursue successful careers in aviation, making USATS a premier choice for aspiring pilots. USATS is dedicated to training, mentoring, and supporting the careers of professional aviators.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
